conbody.p: This document introduces you to the Multimedia Hardware Adaptation Interfaces collection.

section.title: Purpose
section.p:
The Multimedia Hardware Adaptation Interfaces (HAI) collection defines hardware-independent interfaces for controlling the hardware component, such as:
Video hardware

section.title: Architectural Relationship
section.p: The APIs are introduced with their components. The Multimedia components DevVideo and DevSound provide APIs for handling the media data once the raw data stream has been extracted by the Multimedia HAI components.

section.title: Description
section.p: The Multimedia HAI provides support for controlling the hardware component, and handling the data streams.
